The technology significantly reduces greenhouse gas emissions and helps in achieving sustainability goals.

By decentralizing energy production and reducing reliance on the national grid, CHP systems improve overall energy resilience and reduce the risk of disruptions due to external factors.

Experts believe the elephant-like creature, known as Gomphotherium, roamed the area that is now Macedonia millions of years ago.
They estimated the animal would have weighed about 10 tons and have been about 50 years old at the time of its death, roughly 8 million years ago during the Miocene epoch.

It may seem early, but Hallmark is putting on display - for the first time ever - all of Norman Rockwell's iconic Christmas card art.
